com.larkwoodlabs.net.amt
Class MembershipQuery

java.lang.Object
  com.larkwoodlabs.net.amt.MembershipQuery

public final class MembershipQuery
extends Object

A protocol-independent representation of an IGMPv3 or MLDv2 query message.

Author:
Greg Bumgardner (gbumgard)

Constructor Summary
MembershipQuery(InetAddress groupAddress, HashSet<InetAddress> sourceSet, int maximumResponseDelay, int robustnessVariable, int queryInterval)
          Constructs an instance from the specified parameters.
 
Method Summary
 void addSourceAddress(InetAddress sourceAddress)
          Adds a source address to the set of source address associated with the query object.
 InetAddress getGroupAddress()
          Gets the multicast group address specified when the query object was constructed.
 int getMaximumResponseDelay()
          Gets the maximum response delay value specified when the query object was constructed.
 int getQueryInterval()
          Gets the query interval value specified when the query object was constructed.
 int getRobustnessVariable()
          Gets the robustness variable value specified when the query object was constructed.
 HashSet<InetAddress> getSourceAddresses()
          Gets the source address set.
 boolean isGeneralQuery()
          Indicates whether the membership query is a general query (the group address is unspecified - all zeroes).
 boolean isGroupQuery()
          Indicates whether the membership query is a group-specific query (the group address is not zero).
 boolean isSourceQuery()
          Indicates whether the membership query is a group and source-specific query (the group address is not zero and one or more sources are included).
 void setSourceAddresses(HashSet<InetAddress> sourceAddresses)
          Sets the source address set.

Constructor Detail

MembershipQuery

public MembershipQuery(InetAddress groupAddress,
                       HashSet<InetAddress> sourceSet,
                       int maximumResponseDelay,
                       int robustnessVariable,
                       int queryInterval)
Constructs an instance from the specified parameters.

Parameters:
groupAddress - - The multicast address of the group.
sourceSet - - The source set, if any, listed in the query. May be null. This class stores a reference to the original HashSet.
maximumResponseDelay - - Sets the maximum bounds for the random response delay.
robustnessVariable - - Used to specify the number of times an unsolicited state change report should be sent.
Method Detail

isGeneralQuery

public boolean isGeneralQuery()
Indicates whether the membership query is a general query (the group address is unspecified - all zeroes).

Returns:
A boolean value where true indicates that the query is a general query.

isGroupQuery

public boolean isGroupQuery()
Indicates whether the membership query is a group-specific query (the group address is not zero).

Returns:
A boolean value where true indicates that the query is a group-specific query.

isSourceQuery

public boolean isSourceQuery()
Indicates whether the membership query is a group and source-specific query (the group address is not zero and one or more sources are included).

Returns:
A boolean value where true indicates that the query is a group and source-specific query.

getMaximumResponseDelay

public int getMaximumResponseDelay()
Gets the maximum response delay value specified when the query object was constructed. This value is linked the Max Resp Code value contained an IGMPv3 or MLDv2 query packet.

Returns:
An integer number of seconds.

getRobustnessVariable

public int getRobustnessVariable()
Gets the robustness variable value specified when the query object was constructed. This value is linked to the Robustness Variable value contained in an IGMPv3 or MLDv2 query packet.

Returns:
An integer value indicating the number of retransmissions that should be made to report a group membership state change.

getQueryInterval

public int getQueryInterval()
Gets the query interval value specified when the query object was constructed. This value is linked to the QQIC value contained in an IGMPv2 or MLDv2 query packet.

Returns:
An integer number of seconds.

getGroupAddress

public InetAddress getGroupAddress()
Gets the multicast group address specified when the query object was constructed.

Returns:
An InetAddress containing the multicast group address being queried.

getSourceAddresses

public HashSet<InetAddress> getSourceAddresses()
Gets the source address set.

Returns:
A HashSet of source addresses that are being queried.

setSourceAddresses

public void setSourceAddresses(HashSet<InetAddress> sourceAddresses)
Sets the source address set.

Parameters:
sourceAddresses - A HashSet containing source addresses being queried.

addSourceAddress

public void addSourceAddress(InetAddress sourceAddress)
Adds a source address to the set of source address associated with the query object.

Parameters:
sourceAddress - An InetAddress containing a source address. The source address address family (IPv4 or IPv6) must match that of the group address.
